name: Chrono Rift
description:
Step into the shoes of a wizard in Chrono Rift and embark on a thrilling adventure to defend the world from monster invasions caused by mysterious spatiotemporal breaches! Join the Breach Hunter Guild and team up with other players online to take on the challenge. With a mix of fantasy, action, and roguelike elements, get ready to unleash your magic and destroy the breaches before it's too late. Will you be the one to uncover the truth behind this crazy phenomenon and save the world? Play Chrono Rift now!

Replay the game an infinite amount of time by testing different combinations of spells and effect. Wanna go full DPS? Then get the "duplicate projectile" effect to multiply your damage! Wanna deal massive damage to a large crowd of enemies? Why not opt for the "projectile ricochet" effect and AOE spells! Each enemies have elemental strength and weaknesses. Choose your elemental type of damage wisely depending on your teammates and the opponents you will be facing.

It is your duty as Breach Hunters to face invaders of different universes and timelines. Determined to destroy your kingdom, an evil entity opens portals to realms where all sorts of evil creatures reside: Zombies, Aliens, Robots, Orcs and even Pirates! Each of these species have their own behaviors and will use different tactics to try to destroy you. Zombies are slows but numerous melee foes. Aliens are fast but afraid of fire. Robots use futuristic tech and more tactical strategies. Orcs are walking tanks who gets close and personal with his enemies. Finally, pirates are... Well they are pirates!

Team up with up to 3 other Breach Hunters and stop the evils that are invading your realm!

Purchase of this game contains the main game only.
